context: There is one set of twins and one set of triplets. One twin is 7 years older than one triplet. If their combined ages are 44, how old is one of the twins?
subquestions: Define a variable How old is each twin? What is the twins' combined age? What is the triplets' combined age? Write an equation Simplify Simplify Simplify Simplify How old is one of the twins? How old is one of the twins?
subanswers: Let T = age of triplet Twin's age = T + <<+7=7>>7 Twin's combined age = 2 * (T + 7) Triplet's combined age = <<3=3>>3T 2 * (T + 7) + 3T = 44 2T + 14 + 3T = 44 5T + 14 = 44 5T = 30 T = <<6=6>>6 Twin = 6 + 7 = <<6+7=13>>13 The twins are each <<13=13>>13 years old.
